## Description {#details}

Saves strings in the provided stable storage and returns a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> with a stable character pointer.

Saving the same string yields the same <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a>.

Compared to <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringsaver">StringSaver</a>, it does more work but avoids saving the same string multiple times.

Compared to <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dwarf-linker/stringpool">StringPool</a>, it performs fewer allocations but doesn&#39;t support refcounting/deletion.

Definition at line 44 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/stringsaver-h">StringSaver.h</a>.
